title: Company workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a company (vendor).

The workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase. For more information about the out-of-the-box business rules defined for the Company workflow, see Company (Vendor) process - Business rules.

Metaphase: Active

Phase Transition Description
Active Manual

Company is active; maintain close relationship with company

Next phase: Caution or Inactive

Metaphase: Caution

Phase Transition Description
Caution Manual

Company is active, but must be closely supervised.

A cautionary note must be added.

Next phase: Active or Inactive

Metaphase: Inactive

Phase Transition Description
Inactive Manual

Company is inactive

Next phase: Active
